movies.title: Blue Swallow
movies.plot: The First Lady Korean Aircraft Pilot "Pak Kyeong-Won" was born as poor Korean girl in the era of Korea merged by the Japanese Empire. She went to become lady pilot to Japan. To earn study fee, first she became cab driver, afterwards she get second flight license. She was dead by flight accident of tour to Korea by single flight in Izu Japan. This movie describes her life, adventure , romance and death.
movies.simplePlot: The First Lady Korean Aircraft Pilot "Pak Kyeong-Won" was born as poor Korean girl in the era of Korea merged by the Japanese Empire. She went to become lady pilot to Japan. To earn study ...

biography.bio: Jin-young Jang was born on June 14, 1974 in Jeonju, South Korea. She was an actress, known for Sorum (2001), Blue Swallow (2005) and Singles (2003). She was married to Kim Young-kyun. She died on September 1, 2009 in Seoul, South Korea.
biography.name: Jin-young Jang

biography.bio: Ju-hyuk Kim was born on October 3, 1972 in South Korea. He is an actor, known for Love Me Not (2006), My Wife Got Married (2008) and The Truth Beneath (2016).
biography.name: Ju-hyuk Kim

biography.bio: Yûko Fueki was born on June 21, 1979 in Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for Blue Swallow (2005), Apt. (2006) and Jump (2003).
biography.name: Yûko Fueki

biography.bio: Ji-min Han was born on November 5, 1982 in Seoul, South Korea. She is known for her work on The Age of Shadows (2016), Detective K: Secret of Virtuous Widow (2011) and Plan Man (2014).
biography.name: Ji-min Han

biography.bio: Takeo Nakahara is an actor, known for Okoge (1992), Carte des sons de Tokyo (2009) and Godzilla Against MechaGodzilla (2002).
biography.name: Takeo Nakahara

biography.bio: Tôru Nakamura was born on September 5, 1965 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for 2009: Lost Memories (2002), Tokyo Raiders (2000) and K-20: The Fiend with Twenty Faces (2008).
biography.name: Tôru Nakamura

actors.character: The instructor of a flight school

biography.bio: Ju-yeon Ko is an actress, known for The Fox Family (2006), The Apprehenders (2011) and My Wife Is a Gangster (2001).
biography.name: Ju-yeon Ko

awards.award: Korean Association of Film Critics Awards 2006

titlesAwards.titleAwardOutcome: Won Korean Association of Film Critics Award
